pic1_alt: Line chart of Carbon Majors & Global Fossil Fuel and Cement Emissions, 1854 - 2022. This graph shows the carbon dioxide emissions traced to the carbon fuels and cement produced by the Carbon Majors entities and compares them to total global fossil fuel and cement emissions, for coal, oil, natural gas and cement. Trends increase over time, with dramatic increase in the 1950s. There are some minor dips in the mid 1980s and mid 1990s, and 2020. Current levels above 40k.
